timeline.message:
Updated Website Reference

Replaced "http://tiny.cc/EssentialsCommands" with https://essinfo.xeya.me/index.html

Updated Website Reference

Properly changed "http://tiny.cc/EssentialsCommands" to the community maintained "https://essentialsx.net/wiki/Home.html"

timeline.bodyText:
Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
            website: https://essentialsx.net/wiki/Home.html
          
          
            
            website: https://essentialsx.net/
          
      
    
    
  

It would be better to link to the homepage, which is what website is supposed to link to AFAIK - people can find the docs easily from there.
timeline.author: mdcfe
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -3,7 +3,7 @@ name: Essentials

-website: http://tiny.cc/EssentialsCommands

Used root website URL
